hintInputContact: Type your number or other contact
onb_text1: Type your name and write an interesting pickup line.
onb_text2: Be brave and show the screen with your offer to the person you like, for example, in the subway, cafe, bus, club or at a lecture.
onb_text3: Now, most likely, you have her/his contact, go for it! If you didn't manage to get contact, don't worry, next time you will definitely succeed!
